body_html:
Hi @NightCrawler96!
I'm facing the same issue as you described.
Here is my setup:

  • Custom code - Keras with TF on
  • Windows 10
  • Tensorflow installed with pip
  • TensorFlow-gpu 1.8.0
  • Python 3.6.2
  • CUDA 9.0, cuDNN 7
  • Nvidia GeForce GTX 1070 GDDR5 8GB

By the way, did you find any solution for it?

body:
Hi @NightCrawler96!
I'm facing the same issue as you described. 
Here is my setup: 
- Custom code - Keras with TF on
- Windows 10
- Tensorflow installed with pip
- TensorFlow-gpu 1.8.0
- Python 3.6.2
- CUDA 9.0, cuDNN 7
- Nvidia GeForce GTX 1070 GDDR5 8GB

By the way, did you find any solution for it?
